title: Some useful Git configuration options
snippet:
This is a short list of some useful Git config options and commands that are not used that often, but could spare you a lot of headaches and googling time.

To ignore some untracked files without using .gitignore file, you can add patterns to exclude to...

title: Some useful Git commands
snippet:
This is a short list of some useful Git commands that are not used that often, a Git cheat sheet if you will.
